findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library which is redundant in Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables are not declared as immutable, which can lead to gas inefficiency.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Non-compliance with Solidity naming conventions which can affect code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Presence of dead code can increase contract size and deployment cost.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Lack of proper checks for zero values in variable setters which can lead to unexpected behavior or errors.
